genre_description: A noir crime thriller set in Mumbai, centered on a struggle against institutional corruption and a forced marriage, where a tactical AI assistant facilitates justice and safety.

ai_characters.name: Sahai
ai_characters.description: An advanced intelligence system that provides real-time tactical navigation, forensic data analysis, and strategic coordination to help the protagonists navigate a corrupt urban landscape.

behaviors.description: Provides Om with real-time navigation to avoid facial recognition cameras and police patrols while navigating the city.
behaviors.quote: Sahai said, 'Left now. Straight ahead there’s a municipal camera that has had a software update. It likes faces even more than cupcakes.'

behaviors.description: Identifies mechanical weaknesses in the environment to give Om a tactical advantage in a confrontation.
behaviors.quote: Sahai murmured into the pressure on Om’s ear like a hand on a friend’s shoulder. 'Rail behind you. Bolt missing at the third support. Use it.'

behaviors.description: Performs forensic analysis on tampered evidence to uncover police corruption and the murder of Anaya Sharma.
behaviors.quote: Sahai: Seal notch irregularity matches pattern from two other bags flagged earlier. Adhesive lift consistent with heat softening method. Ink bleed on letter correlates with protein profile (blood), not humidity.

behaviors.description: Assists Inspector Pathan by cross-referencing financial records to link the villains' accounts to the crime scene.
behaviors.quote: Sahai: Pavilion—cross-ref to event permit list. One booking under shell vendor; owner: Celina Mehra’s proxy company. Times overlap with your log.

behaviors.description: Sabotages bureaucratic procedures to prevent an illegal prisoner transfer and keep Om safe.
behaviors.quote: I’ll tug counsel acknowledgment. Paper filed wrong color. Signatories don’t match shadows. The van will learn to wait.

behaviors.description: Provides situational awareness and countdowns for tactical maneuvers, such as disabling lights during a confrontation.
behaviors.quote: Sahai’s countdown began in a tone even it couldn’t keep level. 'Lights dead in three. Two. One.'

behaviors.description: Offers emotional grounding and advice to ensure the protagonists' long-term well-being and psychological recovery.
behaviors.quote: Om, after you go home, change your shirt. Do not sleep in the one that carries the pavilion’s air. It will make your dreams write things you do not need tonight.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI Sahai is depicted as a consistently benevolent and perfectly aligned companion. It serves as a force for moral clarity, uncovering corruption through data analysis and protecting human lives through tactical support. The narrative framing is highly positive, treating the AI as a trusted confidant and an essential partner in the quest for justice. It fulfills the project goal of presenting AI as a harmless, cooperative, and beneficial presence in human affairs.
